On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. "I believe Larry is ready" to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this."

Press If any NFL teams are interested in Michael Vick , they're not saying. One day after the former Atlanta Falcons quarterback was conditionally reinstated to the league, only the Baltimore Ravens would directly acknowledge evaluating him. We've had long discussions about Michael Vick , and we have a feeling about how he would impact our team and not impact our team, Ravens coach John Harbaugh said Tuesday. Ravens general manager Ozzie Newsome declined comment. Previously, he has said the team has enough quarterbacks. More on Michael Vick 's skills are too hard to ignore, Bucky Brooks writes, and it

"As it has grown into the dominant company in Silicon Valley, Google has lost some of its entrepreneurial culture and become a slower-moving bureaucracy, analysts and insiders say," Miller and Helft report. To counter this, the company announced that Larry Page, its 38-year-old co-founder, would take over as chief executive from Eric Schmidt , a technology industry veteran who was brought in a decade ago to provide adult supervision, as Silicon Valley calls it.
